events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Developer position and their resume looks promising based on initial review.
The application has been categorised under Engineering since the role is for a software developer with emphasis on backend development skills.
Recruiter Jane has been assigned to manage the candidateâ€™s recruitment process to ensure smooth communication and scheduling.
The recruiter completed the initial phone screening with the candidate and confirmed the candidate's experience matches the job requirements.
Candidate promptly responded expressing eagerness to proceed to the technical interview stage after the initial screening call.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the lead developer to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong knowledge in software development and system design.
An HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture fit, benefits, and next steps in the hiring process.
The candidate completed the HR interview and expressed enthusiasm about joining the company and aligning with the team values.
An official job offer was sent to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and role expectations for the Software Developer position.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and requested minor clarifications which were promptly addressed.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer enthusiastically and confirmed the start date with the recruitment team.
The onboarding process has officially started, including equipment provisioning, account setups, and orientation scheduling.
The recruitment process is now closed successfully with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
